comments: Class numbers of cubic fields with discriminants p^2, where p runs through the primes in A005471.All terms are of the form a^2 + 3*b^2. - _Colin Barker_, Nov 30 2014
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
D. Shanks, The simplest cubic fields, Math. Comp., 28 (1974), 1137-1152 (see Table 1 page 1140).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
